text: Fire Down Below is a 1957 American British adventure movie. It was directed by Robert Parrish. The movie is based on the 1954 novel of the same name by Max Catto. Actors include Rita Hayworth, Jack Lemmon, Robert Mitchum, Herbert Lom, Edric Connor, Peter Illing, and Anthony Newley. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1957 adventure movies Category:1950s American adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Parrish Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Trinidad and Tobago
title: Fire Down Below (1957 movie)
